title: core
text:
CustomImageDataset

 CustomImageDataset (image_dir, loader=<function read_image>,
                     extensions=('png', 'jpg', 'jpeg'), transform=None,
                     target_transform=None)

Subclasses DatasetFolder for custom dataset organised by labels as subfolder names. https://pytorch.org/vision/stable/generated/torchvision.datasets.DatasetFolder.html
